synopsis.text: Between battling goblin invasions, negotiating trade deals with dwarves, and keeping his fiercely protective sister at bay, Peter Grill finds himself in high demand as the land's most revered hero. But his challenges don't end there – a bevy of admiring women, captivated by his more intimate skills, vie for his attention. Amidst this whirlwind of adventure and amorous pursuits, Peter must summon all his resolve to stay focused on his heroic duties in this thrilling and risqué season of Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time - Super Extra!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
